question.text: Select the correct statement from the following.

options.text: Tightly linked genes on the same chromosome show higher recombinations
Genes far apart on the same chromosome show very few recombinations
Genes loosely linked on the same chromosome show similar recombinations as the tightly linked ones
Tightly linked genes on the same chromosome show very few recombinations

solution.text: Distance between two genes determine the strength of linkage and frequency of recombination. Closely located genes on same chromosome shows stronger linkage and very few crossing over. Widely located genes on same chromosome shows weak linkage and higher recombination.
